column1: Relatives and friends may visit the LOMBARDO FUNERAL HOME (Southtowns Chapel)
column2: 3060 Abbott Rd. near Lake Ave. on Thursday from 4-8 PM. A Funeral Service will be held at The Tabernacle
column4: Orchard Park on Friday morning at 11 o'clock. (Please assemble at church). Interment Mt. Olivet Cemetery.
